mods.abstract: Page 55 of the album includes four photographs.; Photograph 1 [227] shows a horse exhibited in profile facing right. Spectators and stables shown in the background.; Photograph 2 [228] shows a horse exhibited in profile facing left. Man in a suit and tie stands directly behind the horse. Stables and a wagon shown in the background.; Photograph 3 [229] shows a horse with ribbons exhibited in profile facing right. Stables and spectators shown in the background.; Photograph 4 [230] shows a burrow or mule exhibited in profile facing left. Stables shown in the background.
mods.note: All photographs probably taken at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
